channel.title: Marketing Optimization w/ AlexDesigns - Ecommerce, Saas & WordPress
channel.description: Improve conversions, generate more leads and make more money from your website every Sunday. Suggest your topics and guests on twitter @AlexDesigns. Weekly experts discuss Conversion Optimization, Saas, Search Engine Optimization SEO, web design, landing pages, inbound, Google Analytics. Plus ecommerce software like Shopify, BigCommerce, Magento, Netsuite and WordPress. Join like-minded entrepreneurs talking optimization for business growth using online marketing, lead generation, content marketing, website analytics, A/B testing and Growth Hackers. Ask about the Conversion Rate Optimization Mastermind Group. Alex Harris has 13+ years of CRO experience.

image.title: Marketing Optimization w/ AlexDesigns - Ecommerce, Saas & WordPress

channel.itunes:author: Alex Harris - Digital Marketing Experts & Website Analytics
channel.itunes:summary: Improve conversions, generate more leads and make more money from your website every Sunday. Suggest your topics and guest on twitter @AlexDesigns. Alex Harris interviews the best in Conversion Optimization, Ecommerce, Search Engine Optimization SEO, web design, landing pages, inbound, Google Analytics, and advanced digital marketing. Marketing optimization for business growth using online marketing, lead generation, content marketing, analytics, A/B testing and growth hackers. Tools mentioned so far include LeadPages, Facebook, CrazyEgg, Kissmetrics, Optimizely and Visual Website Optimizer. Ask about the Conversion Rate Optimization Mastermind Group.
channel.itunes:subtitle: Alex Harris - Digital Marketing Experts & Website Analytics

item.title: Tips - Quick Wins To Increase Conversion Rates for Ecommerce & Saas
item.description:
Another small summary episode with Tips to get Quick Wins To Increase Conversion Rates for Ecommerce & Saas.

Get them all here: http://alexdesigns.com/quickwins


5 Quick Wins To Higher Conversions

1. Qualitative
2. Quantitative
3. Hypothesis
4. UVP & Language
5. Win Quickly

Practical and actionable advice to improve revenue and leads. The quickest way to increase the profit from your website is to increase the conversions. People want to buy from people they like. It takes research and execution.

Strategy is perfect for… Ecommerce, Saas, Landing Pages & WordPress. This quick win process has proven to get a 65% Conversion Improvement. I have done Hundreds of E-commerce, WordPress & Landing Pages. Plus completed. Over 5,000 A/B Tests.

My new book is coming out. Learn more at
http://FreeEcommerceBook.com

Make more money from your website. Get your conversion plan at http://alexdesigns.com
item.itunes:subtitle: Quick Wins E-commerce & Saas

item.title: 003 Bryan Eisenberg - Science of Web Design & Conversion Rate Optimization
item.description:
Bryan Eisenberg breaks down the science of how web design relates to conversion rate optimization and persuasion architecture. Bryan breaks down many different conversion rate optimization frameworks. One my favorite frameworks is the conversion trinity. Understand the 3 magic steps to increase click throughs and conversions. Relevance, Value and Call To Action. So What Is the 3 Step Formula of the Conversion Trinity? Relevance. Are you relevant to my wants/needs/desires (search query)? Have you maintained scent? Value. Do I know why you are the right solution for me? Have you explained your value proposition/offer well? Call to action. Is it obvious what I need to do next? Have you given me the confidence to take that action?

Conversion optimization mastermind at http://alexdesigns.com/mm

Learn more at http://marketingoptimization.tv/
